description.text:
The Northwest Flower & Garden Show is not just a bunch of pretty flowers. It’s the best annual event for gardeners to gather ideas and inspiration to help them create gracious outdoor living spaces just right for the entire family.  
On six acres of dazzling beauty, our Display Gardens are the heart and soul of the show, featuring fully landscaped gardens showcasing the most up-to-date design trends from the region’s top designers. Whether you garden on an acre or a small balcony, you’ll take home hundreds of ideas from the show that will perfectly fit your garden. 
Our Marketplace is a shopping destination, with 350 exhibitors offering practical garden gear and unique nature-inspired art, plus loads of cool plants ready for your garden. These mini-stores have been hand-picked to represent the very best in gardening products. 
The show is known for its outstanding educational programs – over 100 in all, all free – featuring gardening luminaries from around the US, sharing the latest trends and information with both stunning visuals and practical DIY tops. 
Children and parents both enjoy the fun activities and interactive learning of the PlayGarden, along with lively musical entertainment to get kids singing and dancing. There’s even a Treasure Hunt! 
As the 2nd largest garden show in the U.S., the Northwest Flower & Garden Show receives countless accolades from both seasoned gardeners and those just starting to dig in the dirt. It's a true gardener's garden show. Join us as we celebrate our 27th anniversary with “Romance Blossoms.”

ticket_classes.name: Group
ticket_classes.description: **GROUP TICKETS ARE NOT DATE SPECIFIC. VALID ANY ONE DAY OF THE EVENT.** Valid for one adult any one day of the show. This ticket type can only be purchased online, or at the Convention Center during the days of the event. Only available for groups of 20 or more. All ticket sales are final. No refunds or exchanges will be given due to weather, parking issues, illness or travel changes.

ticket_classes.name: Youth
ticket_classes.description: **YOUTH TICKETS ARE NOT DATE SPECIFIC. VALID ANY ONE DAY OF THE EVENT.** Valid for youth ages 13 - 17 years. Children 12 and under are admitted into the show for free. Valid for one youth any one day of the show. This ticket can be purchased either online, at a local retailer (locations will be posted in December 2014) or at the Convention Center any day of the event. All ticket sales are final. No refunds or exchanges will be given due to weather, parking issues, illness or travel changes.

name.text: YPL La Couturiere & Mehbs Fashion Party: Catwalk, Pre-Club Cocktail Social, Press & DJ
name.html: YPL La Couturiere & Mehbs Fashion Party: Catwalk, Pre-Club Cocktail Social, Press & DJ

description.text:
Direct from London Fashion Week, we present La Couturiere Fashion & Mehbs Yaqub Jewellery Design. Presenting their unique SS2015 Fashion collection at an exclusive Young Professionals London event. A night not to be missed featuring FASHION Catwalk show, Models, Photographers, Fashion Magazines, Media, & pre-club Social. 

730pm - 9:30pm: We've booked the SILVER Bar exclusively for Pre-Club Socialising & Networking with those in the Fashion industry & other Young Professionals. 

+ Welcome Cocktail for each guest arriving Pre-8pm. 

+ Multiple hosts assisting with introductions ;)



9:15pm: Exclusive FASHION Catwalk show, with models pre-selected from London Fashion Week. + Press, Models, La Couturier & Mehbs Yaqub network & lots of hidden surprises!


10pm - 3am: DJ + large dance floor in London’s only rooftop Private Members Club. This is as glamorous as it comes. Set admist 1.5 acres of stunning rooftop gardens 100 feet above Kensington highstreet, there’s no better place to kick start your weekend.

Spread the word, invite your friends or come solo and meet lots of new people in one of Londons' most unique nightlife experiences.Tickets prices will increase without notice, therefore early booking is highly recommended to beat price rises.  
 
IMPORTANT NOTES: 
1. Ticket is valid for the no. of people listed in Ticket name, if no. is not present then ticket is valid for 1 person. Guests must be 21 years & over to attend this event, ALL guests must bring valid PHOTO ID for entry, no exceptions. 
2. Tickets are valid for entry Pre-9:30pm ON 14th March 2015 ONLY. NO EXCEPTIONS!  
3. Ticket INCLUDES Welcome Cocktail for those arriving PRE-8:30pm (to be redeemed at the bar pre-9pm) AND Fashion Show + Pre-Club Socialising in SILVER Bar. 
4. Ticket holders can remain for the Club party with DJ till 3am. 
5. DRESS CODE applies i.e. "no effort, no entry" so get glammed up and leave the trainers at home. If you have any questions in relation to dress code BEFORE the event please either email or phone The Roof Gardens or Email youngprofessionalsinlondon@hotmail.co.uk  
6. Ticket is NOT refundable / transferable, issues with entry to The Roof Gardens MUST be communicated on the night of the event whilst at the venue via email to: youngprofessionalsinlondon@hotmail.co.uk  
7. Guests purchasing a group ticket are recommended to arrive together. 
8. Ticket does not need to be printed but please bring a printout of the ticket if purchasing your ticket after 5pm on the day of the event. 
9. Ticket prices may increase without warning & as the event date approaches the only way to gaurantee entry at a certain price is by purchasing a ticket. 
10. The organiser may sell limited no. of tickets at the door at a higher price than what's listed online, please enquire closer to the date for availability.

description.text:
A Social Networking group with an International mix of Young Professionals interested in meeting other like minded people for friendship / networking / partying at exclusive Members Clubs, Lounges & Bars. Age range is 21+ for our Bar / Club events & photo id must be produced on demand. 
The main aim is to socialise / network in an environment where you can be heard over the music. Where coming solo to an event is not an issue as there will always be others happy to socialise with you. Our events can feature up to 5 co-hosts so you will always feel welcome no matter how big or small the event is.

ticket_classes.description: Ticket Admits 1 person & Includes 1 Welcome Cocktail. By Purchasing this ticket you confirm you have read IMPORTANT NOTES.

description.text:
TICKET INFORMATION 

Once you purchase, you will receive an order confirmation email from Eventbrite on behalf of the Boots and Hearts Music Festival. 
IMPORTANT: If you do not see your order confirmation in your inbox, make sure to check your junk/spam folder. If you still do not see your order confirmation, click here to access the Eventbrite help center. 
If you are having any other technical ticketing-related issues with your order, click here to contact Eventbrite. For general festival info, click here.
All sales final
No refunds or exchanges
Program is subject to change without notice
Prices are subject to change without notice
DO NOT tamper, stretch, cut or alter your wristband in any way
Altered wristbands will be invalid and the bearer will be subject to ejection.
Full event bracelets can not be shared (i.e. different people use them on different days)
Boots and Hearts is rain or shine, you all proved that in 2012 and 2013 and 2014!!
Performers and lineup are subject to change without notice

 
ADMISSION TICKETS

RFID wristbands and Camping Pass tickets will be sent out 2-3 weeks prior to the festival
Need to view or update your shipping address? Click here for instructions. You will be able to update your shipping address until May 31, 2015.

 
CAMPING, PARKING, RV, & SHOWER PASSES


For camping rules, please see our Camping Information Page

 
STILL HAVE QUESTIONS?


Please visit our extensive FAQ page
description.html:
TICKET INFORMATION

  • Once you purchase, you will receive an order confirmation email from Eventbrite on behalf of the Boots and Hearts Music Festival.
  • IMPORTANT: If you do not see your order confirmation in your inbox, make sure to check your junk/spam folder. If you still do not see your order confirmation, click here to access the Eventbrite help center.
  • If you are having any other technical ticketing-related issues with your order, click here to contact Eventbrite. For general festival info, click here.
  • All sales final
  • No refunds or exchanges
  • Program is subject to change without notice
  • Prices are subject to change without notice
  • DO NOT tamper, stretch, cut or alter your wristband in any way
  • Altered wristbands will be invalid and the bearer will be subject to ejection.
  • Full event bracelets can not be shared (i.e. different people use them on different days)
  • Boots and Hearts is rain or shine, you all proved that in 2012 and 2013 and 2014!!
  • Performers and lineup are subject to change without notice

ADMISSION TICKETS
  • RFID wristbands and Camping Pass tickets will be sent out 2-3 weeks prior to the festival
  • Need to view or update your shipping address? Click here for instructions. You will be able to update your shipping address until May 31, 2015.

CAMPING, PARKING, RV, & SHOWER PASSES
  • For camping rules, please see our Camping Information Page

STILL HAVE QUESTIONS?
  • Please visit our extensive FAQ page

Premium Admission Full Event + Premium Tent Camping

description.text:
Located in the hear of Mayfair this prestigious Members Bar opposite the Hilton Hotel on Hertford Street. Meet an International mix of Young Professionals in this intimate Bar Lounge setting, FREE entry for all registered guests WITH Alcoholic / Non-Alcoholic Cocktail PURCHASE on arrival.   

9pm- 10:30pm: Network / Socialise & get introdued to new people, establish new connections in a more intimate atmosphere before the bar gets crazy busy. There will be couches, lounges & tables as well as the usual bar stools for you to sit or stand around to chat with each other over drinks ;)

  

10:30pm - 12am Drinks & Socialising + Introductions continue + House DJ FABRIZIA: Even Guys vs Girl Ratio from differrent professional & social backgrounds, 2 Hosts assisting with introductions, an international mix of Languages + FREE Entry for ALL REGISTERING  & ARRIVING before MIDNIGHT * 

  

12am - 5am: Event is no longer hosted but all are welcome to stay at the bar & continue mingling with the people you met & also have the opportunity to meet some the Colony bar members that arrive later in the evening. 


QUESTIONS??? Please EMAIL YoungProfessionalsINLondon@hotmail.co.uk 

IMPORTANT NOTES: 
1. Max. 2 tickets p/person & p/email address, your friend/s are welcome to register separately. 
2. All guests MUST purchase MIN. 1 Alcoholic Drink / Non-Alcoholic Cocktail on arrival that way we can continue hosting free monthly events. * The wait staff have asked people to leave in the past that have not purchased any drinks. 
3. Guests are expected to be in suitable attire. No Scruffy Clothing / No Torn Clothes / No Hoodies/ No Torn Clothes... No Effort = No Entry! 
  
4. PLEASE Bring ID as names "may" be checked at the door especially if you look under 23 bring photo id! 
5. As this is a private members bar & club guests under 18 will NOT be admitted entry, please bring photo id in case asked. 
6. This event is run exclusively by Young Professionals London & it's affiliates, if you have any questions please EMAIL: YoungProfessionalsINLondon@hotmail.co.uk (do NOT contact Colony Club as they just provide the venue) 
7. Doors to the venue open at 8:30pm, host arrives from 9pm.

description.text:
The Calgary Comic & Entertainment Expo is Canada's second largest pop culture event, featuring tons of special guests from film & television, comic books, sci-fi, horror, anime, cartoons & collectibles. Over 418,000 sq. ft. of exhibit space and lots of programming, vendors, and special guests. Over 97,000 people came out last year to the Calgary Expo. 
What does your pass get you? Access to the main exhibit show floor, programming, and all the awesomeness that you can handle! You can check out things like the costume contest, Q & A panels with special guests, workshops, and much more!  
Tickets will ONLY BE AVAILABLE IN ADVANCE, online and at participating retail locations. Ticketholders will be guaranteed entry into the event. There will NOT be any tickets available at the door. The 2014 Calgary Expo sold out weeks before the event, so don't delay in getting your passes! 
There will be a limited amount of Weekend passes available, so please grab your tickets early. 
Deluxe Four Day Pass $125 - BEST VALUE! (+tax & service fees) 

Access to ALL FOUR days
1 Hour early entry on Thursday (3:00pm)
30 Minute early entry on Friday (11:30am)
30 Minute early entry on Saturday (9:30am)
30 Minute early on Sunday (9:30am)
Exclusive shirt, badge & lanyard for deluxe pass holders only
$20 Voucher to use at Expo Store

  
Youth Deluxe Four Day Pass $50 (+tax & service fees) 

Youth ages 8-12
Same access & exclusives as above

  
Four Day Pass $90 (+tax & service fees) 

Access to ALL FOUR Days

  
Single Day Passes - Access to only ONE day 

Thursday Preview Night: $20 (+tax & service fees)
Friday Pass: $30 (+tax & service fees)
Saturday Pass: $40 (+tax & service fees)
Sunday Pass: $35 (+tax & service fees)

  
VIP Package $375 (+tax & service fees) ***SOLD OUT*** 

Premium access to Guests, Photo Ops, Expo Store, VIP seating in main programming rooms
Exclusive VIP pass holders merch (shirt, lanyard, badge)
Swag bag full of goodies
2 Hour early entry on Thursday (2pm)
1 Hour early entry on Friday (11am)
1 Hour early entry on Saturday (9am)
1 Hour early entry on Sunday (9am)
Limited to 550

  
Youth Passes - Ages 8 to 12 (Kids 7 & under are free) 
Youth Four Day Pass: $15 (+tax & service fees) Youth Thursday Pass: $5 (+tax & service fees) Youth Friday Pass: $5 (+tax & service fees) Youth Saturday Pass: $5 (+tax & service fees) Youth Sunday Pass: $5 (+tax & service fees) 
  
Visit www.calgaryexpo.com for an updated guest list, event info, and special events. 
Show Hours: 
Thursday: 4pm - 8pm Friday: 12pm - 8pm Saturday: 10am - 7pm Sunday: 10am - 5pm

description.text:
The Alberta Entertainment Expo is dedicated to promoting the pop culture arts, including comic books, sci-fi, horror, animation, gaming, anime, cartoons, toys & collectibles. There are 3 annual events that are hosted and organized by the Alberta Entertainment Expo. These events feature special guests from film & television, comics, animation, and more! 
The Calgary Expo is held at the BMO Centre in April. Visit www.calgaryexpo.com.
The Edmonton Expo is held at Northlands Park in September. Visit www.edmontonexpo.com.
The Saskatoon Expo is held at Prairieland Park in September. Visit www.saskexpo.com
description.html:
The Alberta Entertainment Expo is dedicated to promoting the pop culture arts, including comic books, sci-fi, horror, animation, gaming, anime, cartoons, toys & collectibles. There are 3 annual events that are hosted and organized by the Alberta Entertainment Expo. These events feature special guests from film & television, comics, animation, and more!

The Calgary Expo is held at the BMO Centre in April. Visit www.calgaryexpo.com.

The Edmonton Expo is held at Northlands Park in September. Visit www.edmontonexpo.com.

The Saskatoon Expo is held at Prairieland Park in September. Visit www.saskexpo.com

Access to the main exhibit show floor, programming, and all the awesomeness that you can handle! You can check out things like the costume contest, Q & A panels with special guests, workshops, and much more!

description.text:
15 years ago, SCOPE Art Show mounted its first edition and changed the landscape of the contemporary art fair industry. The first fair to run concurrent with The Armory Show, SCOPE’s spirit of innovation has consistently forged the way for emerging artists, galleries and art fairs. Attuned to nuances in the market and itself an influential force in the cultural sphere, SCOPE is again poised to usher in a new vision of the contemporary art fair. 
SCOPE New York’s open-plan design eschews the cookie-cutter art fair clamor for a decidedly thoughtful, polished presentation. Maintaining exhibition square footage and improving useable wall space, galleries will no longer be divided into small booths, but rather, flow beautifully into one another, creating curatorial narratives that encompasses the entire show. 
Alongside this new exhibition model, SCOPE New York will host a series of events for Platinum and VIP Cardholders, including private performances, exclusive parties, brunches and cocktail events. These events will welcome our most influential and supportive patrons, celebrating 15 years of SCOPE’s pioneering programming. 
SCOPE New York opens on Friday, March 6 with the Platinum Preview and First View benefit, and will run March 7 - 8, 2015.

The first fair to run concurrent with The Armory Show, SCOPE’s spirit of innovation has consistently forged the way for emerging artists, galleries and art fairs. Attuned to nuances in the market and itself an influential force in the cultural sphere, SCOPE is again poised to usher in a new vision of the contemporary art fair.

SCOPE New York’s open-plan design eschews the cookie-cutter art fair clamor for a decidedly thoughtful, polished presentation. Maintaining exhibition square footage and improving useable wall space, galleries will no longer be divided into small booths, but rather, flow beautifully into one another, creating curatorial narratives that encompasses the entire show.

Alongside this new exhibition model, SCOPE New York will host a series of events for Platinum and VIP Cardholders, including private performances, exclusive parties, brunches and cocktail events. These events will welcome our most influential and supportive patrons, celebrating 15 years of SCOPE’s pioneering programming.

SCOPE New York opens on Friday, March 6 with the Platinum Preview and First View benefit, and will run March 7 - 8, 2015.

description.text: With over 50 art shows spanning more than a decade, SCOPE has solidified its position as the premier showcase for international emerging contemporary art and multi-disciplinary creative programming. SCOPE’s extensive reach enables an unrivaled opportunity for networking with art patrons, creative professionals and a culturally relevant public audience. Renowned for presenting the most innovative galleries, artists and curators, SCOPE Art Shows in Miami, Basel, New York, London and the Hamptons have garnered extensive critical acclaim, with sales of over $700 million and attendance of over 1,000,000 visitors.

description.text:
A special edition of #4PlayFridays "HAIRSHOW EDITION" 
FRIDAY NIGHTS "UPSCALE" FREE ALL NIGHT PARTY FOR "YOUNG BUSINESS PROFESSIONALS" & "INDUSTRY INSIDERS" #4PlayFridays is back and has now moved to "Evilla Restaurant & Bar. We have now upgraded your experience to a venue with great food & premium customer service. 
"FREE ENTRY FOR EVERYONE ALL NIGHT LONG WITH RSVP 
www.EvillaOnFriday.eventbrite.com 
The sexiest place to party on a FRIDAY night in #Atlanta, and why not since its FREE ENTRY FOR EVERYONE "ALL NIGHT."  
Live Broadcast on Hot 107.9 from10PM-12AM 
21 and up to Party- Dress Code is Upscale. 
***ATTENTION***. **FREE BIRTHDAYS AVAILABLE WITH 1 BOTTLE OF CHAMPAGNE** Must have a group of 8 or more to recieve complimentary bottle.   Birthday Sections are first come first serve through the -General Admission Line- txt 770-547-7978 for additional information FREE ALL NIGHT RSVP NOW 
Txt 770-547-7978 for more info 
Your Name will be added to The "So Kold Guestlist" Please give your name, and the list name at the door For faster processing. 
 *Make Sure to Follow @CirocBoyManny on instagram for updates and upcoming events.* 
DOORS OPEN AT 10PM

name.text: BottleRock Napa Valley 2015 - May 29th, May 30th, & May 31st
name.html: BottleRock Napa Valley 2015 - May 29th, May 30th, & May 31st

description.text:
Experience the first taste of summer at BottleRock Napa Valley: May 29-31, 2015. 
FOR BOTTLEROCK BUS TICKETS CLICK HERE 
PARKING PASSES WILL BE AVAILABLE MARCH 1, 2015. 
 
TICKET INFORMATION: 

Once you purchase, you will receive an order confirmation email from Eventbrite on behalf of BottleRock Napa Valley. 
IMPORTANT: If you do not see your order confirmation in your inbox, make sure to check your junk/spam folder. If you still do not see your order confirmation, click here to access the Eventbrite help center. 
All festival admission tickets will be barcoded electronic tickets. Please print or bring your PDF e-ticket to the event for admission. 
Transportation tickets will be barcoded electronic tickets and are available for purchase on the BottleRock Bus page.
If you are having any other technical ticketing-related issues with your order, click here to contact Eventbrite. 
All sales final. No refunds or exchanges.
Event is rain or shine.
Artists and schedule subject to change. 

 
** Only purchase BottleRock tickets from the official BottleRock ticketing page (you're here!). If you purchase from another source, you risk purchasing a counterfeit or invalid ticket. BottleRock is not responsible for tickets purchased from unofficial sources. 
  

By purchasing this ticket you accept the terms and conditions as outlined on www.bottlerocknapavalley.com.

description.text: Recently deemed one of the world’s best festivals by Fest300, BottleRock Napa Valley is a three-day cultural experience filled with world-class music and hospitality. Taking place in the heart of downtown Napa, BottleRock features over 70 acclaimed artists and bands, and food and wine from top chefs and vintners from throughout Northern California.
description.html: Recently deemed one of the world’s best festivals by Fest300, BottleRock Napa Valley is a three-day cultural experience filled with world-class music and hospitality. Taking place in the heart of downtown Napa, BottleRock features over 70 acclaimed artists and bands, and food and wine from top chefs and vintners from throughout Northern California.

ticket_classes.name: 3-Day General Admission $275 *limited availability
ticket_classes.description: Anything but general, the three-day general admission pass provides all that BottleRock is known for: 70+ bands on four stages, great sight lines throughout the venue and in and out privileges for all three days. Tickets also include access to gourmet food from Napa Valley’s finest chefs and restaurateurs, craft beer and specialty cocktails, and dozens of wine cabanas where you can sip, savor and mingle with your favorite vintner. Three days of world-class music combined with wine country living at its finest! HURRY - ONLY A LIMITED QUANTITY OF GA PASSES ARE AVAILABLE AT $275.

ticket_classes.name: 3-Day VIP $595 *limited availability
ticket_classes.description: For those BottleRockers who want an elevated festival experience, our 3-day VIP Pass really cranks up the perks with everything that the 3-day general pass provides, plus special VIP parking close to the venue, prime viewing areas and shade at each stage, and a separate and less crowded entrance and exit. And what VIP doesn’t need a VIP area, providing an oasis with comfy seats, free wifi, full cash-bar, and of course, expanded wine and culinary offerings only available to VIP pass holders? And, did we mention upgraded VIP only restrooms?! Now THAT’S a golden ticket! There are a limited quantity of VIP passes. HURRY - ONLY A LIMITED QUANTITY OF VIP PASSES ARE AVAILABLE AT $595.

ticket_classes.name: 3-Day Platinum $2500 *limited availability
ticket_classes.description: For an experience that only Napa Valley can provide, Platinum pass holders receive access to all VIP benefits plus: exclusive Platinum access to on-stage viewing and viewing areas directly in front of each stage where you can be nearly face to face with some of the top musicians in the world. The Platinum Lounge includes on-site concierge service and complimentary fine wines and foods throughout the weekend. Platinum Passes also include exclusive daily gourmet tasting menus prepared by celebrity Napa Valley chefs, premium cocktails, and very rare Napa Valley wines selected and served by some of the top sommeliers in the world (Master Sommeliers and Masters of Wine). Premium restrooms, parking directly at the event site, air conditioned spaces, and more. Of course this privilege is only available to a select few. Passes are limited. Contact us at platinum@bottlerocknapa.com for more information or if you have questions about Platinum passes.

description.text:
FOR TRANSPORTATION TICKETS CLICK HERE 
FOR PAYMENT PLANS CLICK HERE 
TICKET INFORMATION 

Once you purchase, you will receive an order confirmation email from Eventbrite on behalf of the The Governors Ball Music Festival. 
IMPORTANT: If you do not see your order confirmation in your inbox, make sure to check your junk/spam folder. If you still do not see your order confirmation, click here to access the Eventbrite help center. 
No barcoded festival admission tickets will be issued for this event, all admission ticket-purchasers will receive a festival wristband by mail. Transportation tickets will be barcoded electronic tickets and are available here.
If you are having any other technical ticketing-related issues with your order, click here to contact Eventbrite. For general festival info, click here.
All wristbands will ship in May 2015. Please allow to the end of May for your wristbands to arrive. Wristbands will be sent to the shipping address specified on your order. All international orders will be held at will call.
Need to view or update your shipping address? Click here for instructions. You will be able to update your shipping address until April 30, 2015.
All sales final. No refunds or exchanges.
Event is rain or shine.
Artists and schedule subject to change.

 
**Only purchase Gov Ball tickets from the official Gov Ball ticketing page (you're here!). If you purchase from another source, you risk purchasing a counterfeit or invalid ticket. Gov Ball is not responsible for tickets purchased from unoffical sources.

By purchasing this ticket you accept the terms and conditions.  Click here for terms and conditions.
